name: auth-profile-security
description: Security settings dashboard with password status, 2FA setup, active sessions, trusted devices, and recent security events
postMessage:
Security settings page available at /settings/security

Install shadcn deps: npx shadcn@latest add card badge button switch

Customize sample data in each component file to connect to your auth API. Wire up the action handlers (onChangePassword, onToggle2FA, onSignOut, onRemoveDevice) to your backend.
